Row.Text: "Tiger! Tiger! burning bright[NEWLINE]In the forest of the night[NEWLINE]What immortal hand or eye[NEWLINE]Could frame thy fearful symmetry?"
"Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean it is not real?"
Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
"Never fight fair with a stranger, boy. You'll never get out of the jungle that way."
"Never let your sense of morals prevent you from doing what is right."

"You can only tell, and tell as true as you can. The telling is all you have, for only you have seen the things you have seen. Some will not believe, and they cannot be helped. They must not be blamed, though, for who could believe in such things? But, some may. They are the ones who matter. When we have told all those who will believe, then our work will be done."
